channel.title: Media on Brian James Advisory
channel.description: Recent content in Media on Brian James Advisory

item.title: Men: Don't Make These Mistakes
item.description: My brothers, Let me tell you a story. Last month I had a day trip with my friends and need the mountain bike. But then I realised there was a small problem with the gear of my mountain bike, so I took my tools and tried to fix it (my first attempt ever). Well, I didn’t know why but after a while of trying hard, my bike was totally spoilt.
